info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 5:13PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Scattered strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Mecklenburg, southeastern Prince Edward, Lunenburg and southwestern Nottoway Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 512 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms near Rehoboth, or near Keysville, moving east northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lunenburg around 530 PM EDT. Victoria around 545 PM EDT. Kenbridge and Green Bay around 550 PM EDT. Crewe, Nottoway and Burkeville around 615 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Bacons Fork, Wilburn, Briery, Gills Corner, Arvins Store, Murdocks, Twin Lakes State Park, Nutbush, Finneywood and The Falls. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
